title: Whirlpool
description:
This image shows a spinning formation of ice, clouds, and low-flying fog off the eastern coast of Greenland.
This is a false-color composite image made using infrared, red, and green wavelengths.
theme:
WINTER. Special gallery to set the mood
for snowy days
